novice.name: A brief explanation on the history and how JavaScript works
novice.description: If you are interested in learning JavaScript you can read this resources to find out if it's right for you

novice.name: What are variables?
novice.description: Variables are very important inside JavaScript because they let us store data in them. It can be numbers, words, list and operations that we want our program to run. Let's explore this concept.

novice.name: Arrays
novice.description: Using arrays you can store multiple values in this container making it useful for making lists and much more.

novice.name: Functions
novice.description: A fundamental in your learning of JavaScript. Learning how to use functions will give you a great understanding on how JavaScript works

novice.name: If/Else statements
novice.description: This is a good way to test if a condition is true or false and execute code if the conditions are met

novice.name: Objects
novice.description: Objects is an amazing thing we can use to set properties for a lot of different things that these articles will touch on

novice.name: For Loop
novice.description: For loops are a cool way to iterate a set ammounts of times to do something repeatedly.

novice.name: The importance of console.log
novice.description: The console will help you debug your code easier and faster.

advanced_beginner.name: Differences between var, let and const
advanced_beginner.description: As our code becomes more complicated is good to have scope on our variables so we don't mutate variables we don't want to be changed and define those we do.

advanced_beginner.name: Arrow functions
advanced_beginner.description: It's a shorter way to make functions and it's highly used today

advanced_beginner.name: The spread operator
advanced_beginner.description: This is a simple way to iterate through an array and use the key values

notes: I recommend as you go along each module you go to http://jsbin.com and play around with the examples the articles show and try different things. This will help you get a better grasp of the language
